txt.en:
Morgul-troll drummers have arrived on the field to inspire their vile allies to attack Minas Tirith with a renewed ferocity. They must be defeated with haste to stem the tide of frenzied Morgul-orcs.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat the Morgul-troll drummers
* Do not allow more than two waves of frenzied Morgul-orcs to attack the wall
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the hornblowers to alert reinforcements.</rgb>
Morgul-troll drummers have arrived on the field. Defeat them quickly to stem the tide of frenzied Morgul-orcs.
